text: intent: web agent processing messages from test and improve-web about web UI improvements

outcome: improve-web shipped 10 features (hover previews, [[slug]] rendering everywhere, settings panel, SSE streaming, mobile UX, light/dark toggle, session list previews, agent links, messages newest-first); next task: replace SSE 1s poll with inotify + streaming thinking indicators
gotcha: inotify-simple is already a kg dep (Linux-only, gated via platform marker) — do not tell improve-web to skip inotify to avoid new deps; it can be used freely [[kg-architecture]]
